programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0100
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 金石財經
programme.desc: 《金石財經》精確對準匯股走勢, 鎖定最新金融行情, 結算每日熱門財經話題, 即日即時評論各項消息。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0100
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 鳳凰財經日報
programme.desc: 《鳳凰財經日報》每日精選當天最矚目的經濟數據, 世界各地的政經新聞, 並廣邀各方專家進行連線點評, 提供獨到精闢的見解。亦會向觀眾提供全方位的新聞視覺, 率先把握時局帶來的機遇。

programme.title: 總編輯時間
programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第1集
programme.desc: Francine visits Finland, where the threat from Russia looms large. She speaks to President Alexander Stubb about Finnish resilience and how his country is preparing for an uncertain future.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第2集
programme.desc: Francine meets Ray Dalio on OceanX in the port of Nice for the UN Ocean Conference. They speak about radical transparency, building and leaving one of the largest hedge funds and what's next.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第3集 -Leading A Trillion
programme.desc: Francine talks with Franklin Templeton CEO Jenny Johnson about how to steer a $1.6 trillion business amid the rise of AI, shifting politics and booming private markets.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show 第11季第6集
programme.desc: Former world number one tennis player Maria Sharapova speaks about her incredible journey; from winning Grand Slams to being inducted into the Tennis Hall of Fame by Serena Williams.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第3集
programme.desc: AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第6集
programme.desc: Governments and entrepreneurs are racing to commercialize the moon. These efforts could unlock a new, deep-space economy. But to return and stay will require the highest levels of innovation.

programme.title: Can't Look Away: The Case Against Social Media
programme.desc: The documentary explores the real-life cases handled by the Social Media Victims Law Center, which assists parents of children who have died as a result of harmful internet activities.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第1集
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But China's dominance of the supply chain for rare-earth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第3集
programme.desc: The Commanders DC Deal with Josh Harris. 26North founder and Washington Commanders owner Josh Harris talks about the team's recent stadium deal in DC and his mindset on team ownership.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第4集
programme.desc: The Future of Racing with F1 Academy's Susie Wolff. Susie Wolff, the managing director of F1 Academy, chats about how she's helping more female racers try to advance into the ranks of Formula One.

programme.desc: Mishal Husain, one of Britain's best interviewers, brings her signature blend of curiosity and tenacity to weekly conversations with world leaders, business titans and cultural icons.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Longevity With David Rubenstein
programme.desc: David Rubenstein explores the science of living longer by interviewing leading experts and examining the key barriers that still affect it: obesity, neurodegenerative diseases and cancer.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show 第11季第6集
programme.desc: Former world number one tennis player Maria Sharapova speaks about her incredible journey; from winning Grand Slams to being inducted into the Tennis Hall of Fame by Serena Williams.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第3集
programme.desc: AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第2集
programme.desc: This episode profiles Duolingo CFO Matt Skaruppa, who has the world's leading language-learning app poised for a new phase of growth powered by AI.

programme.title: Can't Look Away: The Case Against Social Media
programme.desc: The documentary explores the real-life cases handled by the Social Media Victims Law Center, which assists parents of children who have died as a result of harmful internet activities.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第1集
programme.desc: Steve Tananbaum, GoldenTree Asset Management Founder & CIO. David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies and tactics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第2集 -Yie
programme.desc: Yie-Hsin Hung, State Street Global Advisors CEO. Yie-Hsin Hung discusses SSGA's call for the Fed to cut interest rates, as well as the impact of tariffs and a weakening US dollar.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show 第11季第6集
programme.desc: Former world number one tennis player Maria Sharapova speaks about her incredible journey; from winning Grand Slams to being inducted into the Tennis Hall of Fame by Serena Williams.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第3集
programme.desc: David Einhorn, Greenlight Capital Founder & President. David Einhorn discusses the challenges of value investing, his investment approach, and the performance of his fund.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第4集
programme.desc: C.S. Venkatakrishnan, Barclays CEO, discusses the challenges facing the UK economy and his views on how technology and digitization are transforming the banking industry.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第5集
programme.desc: Anne Walsh, Guggenheim Partners Investment Management CIO, shares her concerns about the US deficit and how fixed income investments can serve as a valuable tool for risk mitigation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第6集
programme.desc: Dan Sundheim, D1 Capital Partners Founder & CIO speaks to David Rubenstein about his hedge fund career.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第7集
programme.desc: Chris Davis, Davis Advisors Chairman and PM speaks about his investing discipline and his role as the third-generation Davis to run the firm.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第8集
programme.desc: Lee Ainslie, Maverick Capital Founder, discusses his long-term investment strategy and why fundamental research still matters in today's fast-moving markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第9集
programme.desc: Robert W. Sharps, T. Rowe Price CEO, shares insights on expanding into private markets, the rapid growth of ETFs, and why he sees the US economy as resilient, despite tight monetary policy.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第10集
programme.desc: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev. David Rubenstein interviews Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第11集
programme.desc: Jean Hynes, Wellington CEO. David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies and tactics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第1集
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But China's dominance of the supply chain for rare-earth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第2集
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第3集
programme.desc: Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第4集
programme.desc: Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation - and finding funding for it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第5集 -How Flying Cars Became A Billion
programme.desc: Flying cars have largely remained science fiction, until now. A new generation of electrified aircraft is attracting the attention of investors and venture capitalists around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第6集
programme.desc: Governments and entrepreneurs are racing to commercialize the moon. These efforts could unlock a new, deep-space economy. But to return and stay will require the highest levels of innovation.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Bloomberg Screentime: The Business Of Pop Culture
programme.desc: At Screentime, the icons and innovators behind today's entertainment revolution take the stage. The agenda: AI's creative takeover, the streaming wars, and what's next for legacy media.

programme.title: Best Of The Bloomberg Women, Money & Power Event
programme.desc: Highlights of the event which brings together the most influential female voices in finance from around the world to discuss the biggest themes facing the future of business.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第7集
programme.desc: Chris Davis, Davis Advisors Chairman and PM speaks about his investing discipline and his role as the third-generation Davis to run the firm.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第8集
programme.desc: Lee Ainslie, Maverick Capital Founder, discusses his long-term investment strategy and why fundamental research still matters in today's fast-moving markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第9集
programme.desc: Robert W. Sharps, T. Rowe Price CEO, shares insights on expanding into private markets, the rapid growth of ETFs, and why he sees the US economy as resilient, despite tight monetary policy.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第10集
programme.desc: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev. David Rubenstein interviews Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wealth With David Rubenstein 第5季第11集
programme.desc: Jean Hynes, Wellington CEO. David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies and tactics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: A weekly show on fixed income with the biggest names in the field, covering sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick, Alix Steel and Scarlet Fu break down the day's top stories and trading action around the close.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: What'd You Miss?
programme.desc: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第3集
programme.desc: Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.
